item.description:
Hello,

This is an invitation to the seminar I will be giving soon. It is $5 for all meet up memebers to pay for the rent of space.

I hope to see you there
Sincerely,
Rev Gabrielle

read below...

Yoga and the Christ
Friday July 6th 7:30pm
@ Art & Soul, 91 Hampshire Street, Cambridge

Yoga in Sanskrit meaning "union with God." or yeug meaning "to
Join." A Hindu discipline aimed at training the consciousness for
a state of perfect spiritual insight and tranquility.
Christ from the Greek word khriein "to anoint"
or "to make sacred"
As a yoga instructor for over 15 years I have studied the Hindu
text and practiced meditation. I could feel inside me a place of
peace and inner wisdom that was accessible through meditation
and the practice of yoga.
What made the most sense to me was that God, light, peace, joy,
happiness, love, and centeredness was on the inside. I could feel
it in a way that was tangible, especially in sivasana/relaxation. I
want to share with you my personal story of becoming a Christian
priest and my experiences of finding inner peace and the God
Self without having to move to India. The purpose of yoga and
meditation is to maintain a state of balance, harmony and love on
and off the mat.
item.name: Yoga and the Christ
